verbose_text: We confirmed that basal GFP expression in Ly6C hi monocytes was due to IFN signaling; GFP expression was completely lost in the bone marrow and spleen of Mx1 gfp / Ifnar1 -/- and Mx1 gfp / Stat2 -/- mice (XREF_FIG), indicating that basal IFN responses in Ly6C hi monocytes are dependent on type I IFN signaling.
